name: Инженер-программист АСУПТ / PLC
description:
Responsibilities:
  • Develop a real-time data collection, processing, analysis and visualization application using a proprietary hardware and software platform (not Windows, Linux, Android or iOS)
  • Create a simulated operation environment during early development stages
  • Prepare for testing of the actual product remotely during the finalization stages
Requirements:
  • Responsible work attitude, ability to comply with technical requirements and strict deadlines
  • Work experience in related field: 3 years or more
  • Fluency in Basic, C/C++ and CODESYS ST languages
  • English proficiency level: Intermediate or better
    (must be able to read and quickly understand technical documents in English)
  • Being familiar with B&R Automation Studio 4.x is a big advantage
Terms:
  • Remote work, flexible hours but keep up with deadlines and technical requirements
  • Payment is done upon completion of the project stages (1st, 2nd, final). Additional bonus will be paid upon completion on time or before
  • Successful completion of first project may open a possibility to work in South Korea
